attributes.action: listen to what the people of Britain want and respond to e-petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair started this system of e-petitions which is an excellent way of the public's voice being heard.  Unfortunately he seemed unwilling to respond to some petitions.  I ask Gordon Brown through this e-petition to respond to the other e-petitions that have had and in the future will have massive public support.
